meanings.definition: A person who engages in online activities or uses the internet.
meanings.sent1: Many cybercitizens enjoy chatting with friends on social media platforms.
meanings.sent2: The cybercitizens of the forum shared helpful tips on internet safety.
meanings.sent3: The cybercitizens in the virtual world threw a surprise online party.
meanings.sent4: In the vast web of information, cybercitizens are like digital explorers.
meanings.sent5: Cybercitizens play a crucial role in shaping the online landscape.

meanings.definition: The collective group of individuals who participate in virtual communities.
meanings.sent1: Online forums thrive when cybercitizens actively engage in discussions.
meanings.sent2: Cybercitizens from different countries come together to share their experiences.
meanings.sent3: The cybercitizens organized a virtual book club for literature lovers.
meanings.sent4: Within the digital realm, cybercitizens form interconnected networks.
meanings.sent5: The unity among cybercitizens creates a sense of belonging in online spaces.

meanings.definition: The population of individuals who interact in cyberspace.
meanings.sent1: Cybercitizens contribute diverse perspectives to online debates.
meanings.sent2: The growing number of cybercitizens reflects the expansion of the digital world.
meanings.sent3: During the virtual event, cybercitizens showcased their creative talents.
meanings.sent4: In the realm of cyberspace, cybercitizens navigate through information highways.
meanings.sent5: The interconnected web of cybercitizens forms the backbone of online communities.
